title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce: 1. Set a default value for a list box in the report parameter. 2. Modify the default value. 3. Observe that the modified default value is not being retained.
OB: After modifying the default value for a list box in the report parameter, the modified value is not being retained.
EB: The modified default value should be retained in the list box of the report parameter after it has been modified.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter.
2. Set a default value for a list box.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Close and reopen the report parameter to observe if the modified default value is retained.
